definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge
office/situation/classifier for games: match, set, round etc

sentences.english: The Chinese Statistical Bureau provides data more easily than the OECD.
sentences.chinese: 中國國家統計局比經合組織更容易提供數據。

sentences.english: Researching Group of Service Survey Center of Nati.
sentences.chinese: 國家統計局服務業調查中心課題組。

sentences.english: The data issued by the National Bureau of Statistics were in line with market expectations.
sentences.chinese: 國家統計局公佈的這組數據和市場預期基本一致。

sentences.english: The response from the NBS was to cease publication of the series.
sentences.chinese: 國家統計局的迴應方法是停止公佈這一數據。

definition: abbr. for 國家發展和改革委員會|国家发展和改革委员会, PRC National Development and Reform Commission (NDRC), formed in 2003
Nikkei, abbr. for Nikkei Shimbun 日本經濟新聞|日本经济新闻[Ri4 ben3 Jing1 ji4 Xin1 wen2]/abbr. for Nikkei 225 index 日經指數|日经指数[Ri4 jing1 zhi3 shu4]
